name: FH Technikum Moodle Restyle
description:
Restyles FH Technikum Wien Moodle:
  • New custom metro styled icons for various file types (e.g. .pdf, .docx, .txt, .mpeg, ...)
  • Logo padding& positioning adjustments
  • Sidebar collaps icons only show on hover
  • Restyled login page& Back-To-Top Button...
  • Sublte background image
  • Much more coming soon...
additional_info:
Current version: 0.0.6 Beta Current version:
  • New: Style for the course-overview section on the start page, with the new icons
0.0.5 Beta
  • New: Sourcecode icon, Course icon& User icon
  • New: Added missing-icon icon - if you see a red bug instead of an icon then this icon is currently missing - please report with url to original moodle icon
  • New: All icons have been redone and are now in vector format (svg) for better scaling and more sharpness
  • Change: Images are now hosted on Dropbox
0.0.4 Beta:
  • Fix: Fixed icon paths (they seem to be dynamic - now it should work even with changes to the number-part of the url)
  • New: Added Feedback Icon
  • New: Back-To-Top Button: Restyled
  • New: Login Page: Unnecessary stuff like guest login or cookie info is now hidden & better spacing between elements
  • New: Navigation: Child-elements now extend to full width of your screen; Unnecessary text "You are logged in as" is now not visible
